20101205171734.333|20101205171737.667|CCO|>> IT WAS AN EMBARRASSING AND 
20101205171737.667|20101205171741.000|CCO|PAINFUL EXPERIENCE.
20101205171741.000|20101205171744.333|CCO|BUT SOMEHOW I WAS PLEASED TO

20101205171941.000|20101205171942.429|CCO|NO, THERE'S NO EVIDENCE OF 
20101205171942.429|20101205171943.857|CCO|CORRUPTION.

20101205171957.000|20101205171959.000|CCO|>> CONGRESSMAN, YOU ALSO SAID

20101205172019.333|20101205172021.000|CCO|HOME.

20101205172026.000|20101205172028.500|CCO|REPUBLICANS OR DEMOCRATS, THEY 
20101205172028.500|20101205172031.000|CCO|KNEW THAT WHAT I HAD DONE DID

20101205172032.667|20101205172034.333|CCO|CENSURE.
20101205172034.333|20101205172036.000|CCO|AND SO I ACCEPTED IT, AND I WANT

20101205172037.667|20101205172039.333|CCO|THERE'S SO MUCH WORK THAT HAS TO

20101205172041.000|20101205172043.500|CCO|AND I'M VERY ANXIOUS TO GET 
20101205172043.500|20101205172046.000|CCO|STARTED.
20101205172046.000|20101205172048.500|CCO|>> THERE HAS BEEN A SUGGESTION

20101205174433.000|20101205174435.000|CCO|SAY TO REPUBLICANS, OKAY, NOW

20101205175431.000|20101205175432.667|CCO|>>> WE CLOSE TODAY WITH A LOOK 
20101205175432.667|20101205175434.333|CCO|BACK AT A MUSIC LEGEND WHOSE 
20101205175434.333|20101205175436.000|CCO|POLITICAL ACTIVISM WAS SO 
20101205175436.000|20101205175437.667|CCO|POWERFUL, HE MADE A PRESIDENT 
20101205175437.667|20101205175439.333|CCO|NERVOUS.
20101205175439.333|20101205175441.000|CCO|IN 1971, JOHN LENNON, BY THEN AN
20101205175441.000|20101205175442.667|CCO|EX-BEATLE, MOVED TO AMERICA WITH
20101205175442.667|20101205175444.333|CCO|HIS PARTNER, YOKO ONO.
20101205175444.333|20101205175446.000|CCO|THE NIXON ADMINISTRATION VIEWED 
20101205175446.000|20101205175447.667|CCO|HIS HIGH-PROFILE OPPOSITION TO 
20101205175447.667|20101205175449.333|CCO|THE VIETNAM WAR AND HIS 
20101205175449.333|20101205175451.000|CCO|OUTSPOKEN SUPPORT OF VIGS FOR 
20101205175451.000|20101205175454.333|CCO|BLACKS AND NATIVE AMERICANS A 
20101205175454.333|20101205175457.667|CCO|THREAT.
20101205175457.667|20101205175501.000|CCO|NIXON WANTED HIS DEPORTED.
20101205175501.000|20101205175502.429|CCO|LENNON WAS SHOT CAN KILLED BY A 
20101205175502.429|20101205175503.857|CCO|DERANGED FAN 30 YEARS AGO IN NEW
20101205175503.857|20101205175505.286|CCO|YORK.
20101205175505.286|20101205175506.714|CCO|I SPOKE EARLIER ABOUT LENNON, 
20101205175506.714|20101205175508.143|CCO|MUSIC, AND POLITICS WITH A MAN 
20101205175508.143|20101205175509.571|CCO|WHO SPENT 14 YEARS IN COURT 
20101205175509.571|20101205175511.000|CCO|FORCING THE RELEASE OF THOSE 
20101205175511.000|20101205175516.000|CCO|SECRET FBI DOCUMENTS.
20101205175516.000|20101205175521.000|CCO|HE IS THE AUTHOR OF "GIMME SOME 
20101205175521.000|20101205175522.250|CCO|TRUTH: THE JOHN LENNON FBI 
20101205175522.250|20101205175523.500|CCO|FILES."
20101205175523.500|20101205175524.750|CCO|I KNOW MOST PEOPLE KNOW THE 
20101205175524.750|20101205175526.000|CCO|MUSIC HISTORY OF JOHN LENNON, I 
20101205175526.000|20101205175527.250|CCO|THINK HIS POLITICS ARE LESS 
20101205175527.250|20101205175528.500|CCO|KNOWN.
20101205175528.500|20101205175529.750|CCO|WHEN DO YOU THINK HE BECAME 
20101205175529.750|20101205175531.000|CCO|POLITICIZED?
20101205175531.000|20101205175534.333|CCO|>> WELL, IN SOME WAYS, IT'S -- 
20101205175534.333|20101205175537.667|CCO|YOU KNOW, HE RECORDED "GIVE 
20101205175537.667|20101205175541.000|CCO|PEACE A CHANCE" IN 1968/1969.
20101205175541.000|20101205175543.000|CCO|THAT'S WHEN HE GETS -- BUT EVEN 
20101205175543.000|20101205175545.000|CCO|BEFORE THAT, THE BEATLES CAME --
20101205175545.000|20101205175547.000|CCO|WHEN THEY WERE IN THE UNITED 
20101205175547.000|20101205175549.000|CCO|STATES IN 1966, THEY SAID, WE 
20101205175549.000|20101205175551.000|CCO|THINK ABOUT THE VIETNAM WAR ALL 
20101205175551.000|20101205175553.000|CCO|THE TIME, LENNON SAID, HE 
20101205175553.000|20101205175555.000|CCO|THOUGHT ABOUT IT EVERY DAY.
20101205175555.000|20101205175557.000|CCO|IN SOME WAYS, THIS WASN'T SO 
20101205175557.000|20101205175559.000|CCO|DIFFERENT FROM MILLIONS OF OTHER
20101205175559.000|20101205175601.000|CCO|YOUNG PEOPLE, SO THE VIETNAM WAR
20101205175601.000|20101205175602.429|CCO|IS REALLY WHAT RADICALIZED JOHN 
20101205175602.429|20101205175603.857|CCO|LENNON, I THINK.
20101205175603.857|20101205175605.286|CCO|>> IT'S SORT OF HIS WORLD VIEW 
20101205175605.286|20101205175606.714|CCO|AND THE ANTI-WAR STANCE THAT HE 
20101205175606.714|20101205175608.143|CCO|HAD THAT MAKES HIM, I THINK, 
20101205175608.143|20101205175609.571|CCO|SORT OF ICONIC IN MUSIC AS WELL 
20101205175609.571|20101205175611.000|CCO|AS IN POLITICS.
20101205175611.000|20101205175613.500|CCO|I WANT TO PLAY JUST A -- 
20101205175613.500|20101205175616.000|CCO|SPEAKING OF ICONIC, THE THING I 
20101205175616.000|20101205175618.500|CCO|THINK IS MOST IDENTIFIED WITH 
20101205175618.500|20101205175621.000|CCO|JOHN LENNON IN POLITICS.
20101205175621.000|20101205175626.000|CCO| IMAGINE THERE'S NO COUNTRIES, 
20101205175626.000|20101205175631.000|CCO|IT ISN'T HARD TO DO 
20101205175631.000|20101205175641.000|CCO| NOTHING TO KILL OR DIE FOR, 
20101205175641.000|20101205175651.000|CCO|AND NO RELIGION TOO 
20101205175651.000|20101205175653.000|CCO| IMAGINE ALL THE PEOPLE, LIVING
20101205175653.000|20101205175655.000|CCO|LIFE IN PEACE 
20101205175655.000|20101205175657.000|CCO|>> I HEARD, PROFESSOR, THAT JOHN
20101205175657.000|20101205175659.000|CCO|LENNON, AT ONE POINT, SAID THAT 
20101205175659.000|20101205175701.000|CCO|"IMAGINE," WHICH IS THAT SONG, 
20101205175701.000|20101205175702.667|CCO|OF COURSE, IS ANTI-RELIGIOUS, 
20101205175702.667|20101205175704.333|CCO|ANTI-CONVENTIONAL, AND 
20101205175704.333|20101205175706.000|CCO|ANTI-CAPITALIST, BUT THAT PEOPLE
20101205175706.000|20101205175707.667|CCO|ACCEPTED IT BECAUSE IT WAS SUGAR
20101205175707.667|20101205175709.333|CCO|COATED.
